vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.10;
son of: Shaharaim (H7842) and Hodesh (H2321);
brother of: Jobab (H3103J), Zibia (H6644), Mesha (H4331), Malcam (H4445A), Sachia (H7634), Mirmah (H4821), Abitub (H0036) and Elpaal (H0508)
§ Jeuz = "counsellor"
head of a house of Benjamin
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Saharaim; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶烏斯 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "策士"
一個便雅憫家族的首領 (代上 8:10)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
耶乌斯 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "策士"
一个便雅悯家族的首领 (代上 8:10)
